title: Must Read: New Balance and Miu Miu Release New Collection With Coco Gauff, Carolina Herrera to Show Spring 2026 Collection in Madrid
description: These are the stories making headlines in fashion on Wednesday. Miu Miu and New Balance are releasing their latest collaboration, this time in partnership with American tennis champion Coco Gauff. The collection will include new co-branded clothing, footwear and accessories in various colorways, ...Continue reading
author: Brooke Frischer
